Row.Text: +300 [ICON_GOLD] Gold whenever you conquer a city for the first time or when you earn [ICON_GOLD] Gold from a Barbarian Outpost. The [ICON_GOLD] Gold becomes 500 after researching Metal Casting and 700 after Steel (on Standard Speed). When targeting Barbarians receive +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength and always earn normal XP.

Hail Caesar! General, patrician, and dictator of Rome. Your people – and your ambition – call to you across the ages. The die is cast – and let none stand against your vision, whether they be your bitter foes, or your closest friends.
